thread.title: Diane

author: Diane
title: Diane
text: I cannot say enough about this brilliant service. The moment I logged my request for a home tyre service I received a call asking me what time I would like. I got exactly the time I wanted. The guy called 30 minutes before he arrived, turned up on time, was very polite and efficient. I honestly cannot fault this excellent service - well done From making a booking on line to getting new tyres fitted was under 24 hours - how's that for service?!
